event.title: "Prometheus. Not just for microservices" and "Provisioning environments in AWS"
event.description:
19:00 - arrive

19:00 - 19:20 - pizza, drinks, networking

19:25 - Tom Fawcett will give a talk on "Prometheus. Not just for microservices."

Topic: Paxport has been using Prometheus to monitor a wide variety of systems for over two years. You don't need native instrumentation, or a microserviced environment to start getting real value from Prometheus.

20:00 - David Pintor from BJSS will give a talk on 'Provisioning identical prod-like environments in AWS with a single click'

Summary: a talk about CI/CD pipelines and how I solved the challenge to be able to deploy unlimited prod-like environments for devs in AWS with a single click, using Terraform, Docker and bash scripts.

• About David: David is a Platform Engineer in BJSS with a strong background in consulting and operations. For the last year he’s been working in a couple of different projects for NHS Digital.
